title: Will it continue downloading the update?
body: Hello, Good Morning/Evening! I am from the beautiful country of Philippines. I wanted to ask, what if i closed the Update Client? Will it continue when i turn it back on? because i am really having a connection problem as of the moment and i wanted to play lol na. I hope Riot will answer this question as soon as possible before 2hours. because we are going on a trip lmao. THANKYOU IN ADVANCE THOUGH! ♥{{champion:412}} Main of lolph ☺ IGN (lolph): I Support Simon

replies.body:
I rushed as quickly as I could, but it looks like I'm a liiiiiiittle bit later than you had hoped =(.

Regardless, I wanted to touch base with you still and try to help out. The download isn't able to be paused, unfortunately, so you'll need to let that download finish in one go. If you close the update, it will need to restart.
